<a id="TileData"></a>

# TileData

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

Settings for a single tile in a [TileSet](TileSet.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**TileData** object represents a single tile in a [TileSet](TileSet.md). It is usually edited using the tileset editor, but it can be modified at runtime using [TileMapLayer._tile_data_runtime_update()](TileMapLayer.md#TileMapLayer_private_method__tile_data_runtime_update).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<a id="TileData_signal_changed"></a>

**changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_signal_changed)

Emitted when any of the properties are changed.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="TileData_property_flip_h"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **flip_h** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_flip_h)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flip_h**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_flip_h**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the tile will have its texture flipped horizontally.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_flip_v"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **flip_v** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_flip_v)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flip_v**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_flip_v**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the tile will have its texture flipped vertically.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_material"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Material](Material.md) **material** [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_material)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_material**\ (\ value\: [Material](Material.md)\ )
- [Material](Material.md) **get_material**\ (\ )

The [Material](Material.md) to use for this **TileData**. This can be a [CanvasItemMaterial](CanvasItemMaterial.md) to use the default shader, or a [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md) to use a custom shader.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_modulate"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **modulate** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_modulate)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_modulate**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_modulate**\ (\ )

Color modulation of the tile.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_probability"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **probability** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_probability)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_probability**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_probability**\ (\ )

Relative probability of this tile being selected when drawing a pattern of random tiles.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_terrain"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **terrain** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_terrain)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_terrain**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_terrain**\ (\ )

ID of the terrain from the terrain set that the tile uses.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_terrain_set"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **terrain_set** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_terrain_set)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_terrain_set**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_terrain_set**\ (\ )

ID of the terrain set that the tile uses.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_texture_origin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2i](Vector2i.md) **texture_origin** = `Vector2i(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_texture_origin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_origin**\ (\ value\: [Vector2i](Vector2i.md)\ )
- [Vector2i](Vector2i.md) **get_texture_origin**\ (\ )

Offsets the position of where the tile is drawn.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_transpose"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **transpose** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_transpose)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_transpose**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_transpose**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the tile will display transposed, i.e. with horizontal and vertical texture UVs swapped.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_y_sort_origin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **y_sort_origin** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_y_sort_origin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_y_sort_origin**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_y_sort_origin**\ (\ )

Vertical point of the tile used for determining y-sorted order.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_property_z_index"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **z_index** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TileData_property_z_index)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_z_index**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_z_index**\ (\ )

Ordering index of this tile, relative to [TileMapLayer](TileMapLayer.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="TileData_method_add_collision_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_collision_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_add_collision_polygon)

Adds a collision polygon to the tile on the given TileSet physics layer.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_add_occluder_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_occluder_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_add_occluder_polygon)

Adds an occlusion polygon to the tile on the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_collision_polygon_one_way_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_collision_polygon_one_way_margin**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_collision_polygon_one_way_margin)

Returns the one-way margin (for one-way platforms) of the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_collision_polygon_points"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_collision_polygon_points**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_collision_polygon_points)

Returns the points of the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_collision_polygons_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_collision_polygons_count**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_collision_polygons_count)

Returns how many polygons the tile has for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_constant_angular_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_constant_angular_velocity**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_constant_angular_velocity)

Returns the constant angular velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_constant_linear_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_constant_linear_velocity**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_constant_linear_velocity)

Returns the constant linear velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_custom_data"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **get_custom_data**\ (\ layer_name\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_custom_data)

Returns the custom data value for custom data layer named `layer_name`. To check if a custom data layer exists, use [has_custom_data()](TileData.md#TileData_method_has_custom_data).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_custom_data_by_layer_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **get_custom_data_by_layer_id**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_custom_data_by_layer_id)

Returns the custom data value for custom data layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_navigation_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[NavigationPolygon](NavigationPolygon.md) **get_navigation_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), flip_h\: [bool](bool.md) = false, flip_v\: [bool](bool.md) = false, transpose\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_navigation_polygon)

Returns the navigation polygon of the tile for the TileSet navigation layer with index `layer_id`.

\ `flip_h`, `flip_v`, and `transpose` allow transforming the returned polygon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_occluder"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[OccluderPolygon2D](OccluderPolygon2D.md) **get_occluder**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), flip_h\: [bool](bool.md) = false, flip_v\: [bool](bool.md) = false, transpose\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_occluder)

**Deprecated:** Use [get_occluder_polygon()](TileData.md#TileData_method_get_occluder_polygon) instead.

Returns the occluder polygon of the tile for the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

\ `flip_h`, `flip_v`, and `transpose` allow transforming the returned polygon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_occluder_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[OccluderPolygon2D](OccluderPolygon2D.md) **get_occluder_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md), flip_h\: [bool](bool.md) = false, flip_v\: [bool](bool.md) = false, transpose\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_occluder_polygon)

Returns the occluder polygon at index `polygon_index` from the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

The `flip_h`, `flip_v`, and `transpose` parameters can be ``true`` to transform the returned polygon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_occluder_polygons_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_occluder_polygons_count**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_occluder_polygons_count)

Returns the number of occluder polygons of the tile in the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_get_terrain_peering_bit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_terrain_peering_bit**\ (\ peering_bit\: [CellNeighbor](TileSet.md#enum_TileSet_CellNeighbor)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_get_terrain_peering_bit)

Returns the tile's terrain bit for the given `peering_bit` direction. To check that a direction is valid, use [is_valid_terrain_peering_bit()](TileData.md#TileData_method_is_valid_terrain_peering_bit).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_has_custom_data"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_custom_data**\ (\ layer_name\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_has_custom_data)

Returns whether there exists a custom data layer named `layer_name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_is_collision_polygon_one_way"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_collision_polygon_one_way**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_is_collision_polygon_one_way)

Returns whether one-way collisions are enabled for the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_is_valid_terrain_peering_bit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_valid_terrain_peering_bit**\ (\ peering_bit\: [CellNeighbor](TileSet.md#enum_TileSet_CellNeighbor)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_is_valid_terrain_peering_bit)

Returns whether the given `peering_bit` direction is valid for this tile.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_remove_collision_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_collision_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_remove_collision_polygon)

Removes the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_remove_occluder_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_occluder_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_remove_occluder_polygon)

Removes the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_collision_polygon_one_way"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_collision_polygon_one_way**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md), one_way\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_collision_polygon_one_way)

Enables/disables one-way collisions on the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_collision_polygon_one_way_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_collision_polygon_one_way_margin**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md), one_way_margin\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_collision_polygon_one_way_margin)

Sets the one-way margin (for one-way platforms) of the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_collision_polygon_points"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_collision_polygon_points**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md), polygon\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_collision_polygon_points)

Sets the points of the polygon at index `polygon_index` for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_collision_polygons_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_collision_polygons_count**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygons_count\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_collision_polygons_count)

Sets the polygons count for TileSet physics layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_constant_angular_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_constant_angular_velocity**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), velocity\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_constant_angular_velocity)

Sets the constant angular velocity. This does not rotate the tile. This angular velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_constant_linear_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_constant_linear_velocity**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), velocity\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_constant_linear_velocity)

Sets the constant linear velocity. This does not move the tile. This linear velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile. This is useful to create conveyor belts.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_custom_data"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_custom_data**\ (\ layer_name\: [String](String.md), value\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_custom_data)

Sets the tile's custom data value for the TileSet custom data layer with name `layer_name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_custom_data_by_layer_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_custom_data_by_layer_id**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), value\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_custom_data_by_layer_id)

Sets the tile's custom data value for the TileSet custom data layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_navigation_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Sets the navigation polygon for the TileSet navigation layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_occluder"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_occluder**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), occluder_polygon\: [OccluderPolygon2D](OccluderPolygon2D.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_occluder)

**Deprecated:** Use [set_occluder_polygon()](TileData.md#TileData_method_set_occluder_polygon) instead.

Sets the occluder for the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_occluder_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_occluder_polygon**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygon_index\: [int](int.md), polygon\: [OccluderPolygon2D](OccluderPolygon2D.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_occluder_polygon)

Sets the occluder for polygon with index `polygon_index` in the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_occluder_polygons_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_occluder_polygons_count**\ (\ layer_id\: [int](int.md), polygons_count\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_occluder_polygons_count)

Sets the occluder polygon count in the TileSet occlusion layer with index `layer_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TileData_method_set_terrain_peering_bit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_terrain_peering_bit**\ (\ peering_bit\: [CellNeighbor](TileSet.md#enum_TileSet_CellNeighbor), terrain\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TileData_method_set_terrain_peering_bit)

Sets the tile's terrain bit for the given `peering_bit` direction. To check that a direction is valid, use [is_valid_terrain_peering_bit()](TileData.md#TileData_method_is_valid_terrain_peering_bit).
